title: Introduction to Event Streaming!
description:
In the first session, we will cover the core concepts of event streaming, introduce the main features and use cases and run a live demo using Apache Pulsar! You will then get to take the driving seat and run your very own Pulsar deployment - taking the first step into Event Streaming!
